snippet: Barclays said Friday it paid its chief executive, Robert E. Diamond Jr., £6.3 million, or $10.3 million, for last year, with his pay falling as profit at the big British bank slipped.
abstract: Barclays said Friday it paid its chief executive, Robert E. Diamond Jr., £6.3 million, or $10.3 million, for last year, with his pay falling as profit at the big British bank slipped.

headline.print_headline: Chief Executive at Barclays To Get $10.3 Million for 2011
